channel.title: Apps on Jacob Goldstein's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on Jacob Goldstein's Website

item.title: Orion Twitch Client for Linux
item.description: Orion- Twitch Client For Linux Orion is a free and open source QML / C++ client for Twitch.tv which can use multiple player backends (including mpv). The application runs on Linux, Windows, macOS and Android. Using Orion you can watch live Twitch streams and past broadcasts, and browse or search games and channels using a nice material user interface. What’s more, Orion lets you login to Twitch, so you can chat and follow channels (and receive notifications when a channel you follow goes online).

item.title: Best Linux Software
item.description: Best Linux Desktop Software Awards per Category for 2017! hey! you do realize that this post is only written because i was bored to do anything else, right? also i want to make super clear that on these awards, we ran a set of completely democratic procedures, with a fully transparent voting. and by ‚Äúwe‚Äù i mean ‚Äúme‚Äù, and by ‚Äúvoting‚Äù i mean a single vote! ‚Äúmine‚Äù üëê i will try to cover some basic categories, but not everything!
